meanings.definition: Having the most knurls or gnarled bumps.
meanings.sent1: The old tree in the forest had the knurliest bark I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The knurliest branches of the tree provided the perfect perches for the birds.
meanings.sent3: The knurliest tree in the park seemed to have its own unique character.
meanings.sent4: Her knurliest thoughts were always the most intriguing and complex.
meanings.sent5: The knurliest rocks along the riverbank made for a challenging climb.

meanings.sent1: The knurliest sweater she owned was the warmest and coziest.
meanings.sent2: His knurliest scarf kept him snug during the chilly winter days.
meanings.sent3: The knurliest hat she wore made her look like a stylish explorer.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the knurliest plants stood out with their unique textures.
meanings.sent5: The knurliest blanket on the bed was her favorite for its softness and warmth.
